questions.question: What is the meaning of life?
questions.author: Lucas

questions.question: Where in Iceland should I visit?
questions.author: Meredith
questions.notes: I want to see beautiful landscapes.

answers.answer: The meaning of life cannot be answered with a blanket statement. Each individual must find his or her own meaning.
answers.author: Katherine

answers.answer: Perhaps you didn't eat enough today.
answers.author: Anonymous
